item.title: 关于
item.description:
👋Hi,I am Jack

I am a cybersecurity practitioner and an amateur photographer. I enjoy exploring new fields and have a keen interest in photography, movies, and sports. In my spare time, I like to tinker with things that are useless but interesting. You can contact me via 📨email.

I believe in lifelong learning and the integration of knowledge and action. I hope to keep learning and growing continuously, while also thinking and exploring during leisure time. Maintaining an open-minded attitude towards the world is important to me.

🖥️About the Website

inecho.cc is actually my third domain name, and inecho is also my third personal website. Previously, the first two websites were “Multidimensional Can” using the WordPress framework, and a photography website using the Notion & Vercel solution. However, both of these websites did not persist for various reasons. After a year of website closure, I couldn’t resist building a new blog website, which is what you are seeing now on inecho.cc.

inecho.cc is not derived from the meaning of “echo printing” in the bat command, but rather from the meaning of “echo resonance,” implying making sounds, hearing echoes, and self-improvement. Therefore, I hope to continue writing on inecho, producing more articles and engaging in deeper thoughts.

⏳Last

This website was created in January 2024, the year of Jiachen in the Chinese lunar calendar.
